Hi! I'm Akhil. I'm a Machine Learning Engineer working with LLMs.

## Experience

### Netomi

Since July'19 I have been working at [Netomi](https://www.netomi.com/) as an ML Engineer and a Data Scientist. It has been a wonderful experience with great teammates and mentors I got the opportunity to learn a lot about software engineering, data science and machine learning. Some of my key skills I picked up at Netomi are

- Working with Open Source LLMs and optimising them using SOTA techniques.
- Working with LLM frameworks to develop great products
- Developing enterprise grade services utilising LLMs and similar scale models to serve high volume traffic.

### Fractal Analytics

This was my first job out of university! Here I worked as a consultant, I worked with visualising and transforming huge volumes of data for major Fortune 500 companies.
